mods.abstract: Two color window card (black and red on white) announcing George Morgan with Betty Jean Robinson, Little Roy Wiggins, Herb and Barb, and the Country Persuaders at the I.U.E. 711 Hall in Mansfield, Ohio on March 22. Poster features metal photoplates of George Morgan and Betty Jean Robinson. For additional information about this poster see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/39817.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
